title: Daughters Of Arianna: Auroara
description: Auroara is the first book in the Daughters of Arianna series. Auroara de'Tygal is the beautiful eldest daughter of the Elven Empress Arianna and sworn protector of her family. Garrick del'Winmirror is the handsome only child of a wealthy Elven rancher of a lesser Elven house. Hard working and loyal to his land. When Garrick was accused of trying to overthrow the empress, Auroara was sent to make sure that Garrick would arrive safely to stand trial. Along the way Auroara discovered several mysteries that needed to be solved. The hardest of the mysteries to solve was that of Garrick's guilt or innocence.
author: Aileene Pollard
